channel.title: BRUTALISM Radioshow
channel.itunes:author: BRUTALISM
channel.description: BRUTALISM Radioshow with all kinds of extreme metal. Brought to you weekly without censorship just for your pain and pleasure!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly radioshow with extreme metal
channel.itunes:summary: BRUTALISM Radioshow is meant to hear extreme tunes from underground bands from all over the world. You can expect death, black, grind and thrash but also heavy metal. Tune in every week as it is for your pain and pleasure.

item.title: Radioshow #10 - 2011
item.itunes:author: BRUTALISM
item.description: H.O.S. - Ad Patres - Gorgasm - Panychida - Dysthymia - PitchBlack - Lugubre - Bloodride - Scars On Murmansk - Demonical - Ezophagothomia - Sarpentra - Witheria - Isolfur - Depurity - Vociferance
item.itunes:subtitle: Metal Radioshow
item.itunes:summary: 1. Annihilation Of Society - H.O.S. 2. Scorn Aesthetics - Ad Patres 3. Third Degree Taste - Gorgasm 4. Flaming Forests - Panychida 5. Damaged Essence - Dysthymia 6. Don't Make Me Mad - PitchBlack 7. Musterd Gas Ambrosia - Lugubre 8. Slave Of Evil - Bloodride 9. My Death - Scars On Murmansk 10. Darkness Awaits - Demonical 11. Parasitic Vivisection - Ezophagothomia 12. III - Sarpentra 13. Perished In Torment - Witheria 14. Grabgesang - Isolfur 15. I Demigod - Depurity 16. Lies Of The Priest - Vociferance
item.itunes:keywords: brutalism, metal, thrash, death, black, grind, heavy, brutal
